name: JohoSmart
0:
”Alexa, turn on the light”
”Alexa,turn on the socket”
”Alexa,set the light to red”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Description
Joho Smart light and socket, is an intelligent hardware, the main function of the skills to control the light color,make sure you have the latest Alexa app on your device, you have your Joho Smart light or socket, and activate the Joho Smart Skill. This will require your Joho Smart app account email and password to authorize Alexa to access your devices.
